meanings.sent1: The likers of the movie gave it a thumbs up.
meanings.sent2: Social media platforms track the number of likers on each post.
meanings.sent3: The likers of spicy food always ask for extra hot sauce.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the liker of all things vintage.
meanings.sent5: The likers of adventure seek out new experiences wherever they go.

meanings.definition: Those who have a tendency to like things.
meanings.sent1: The likers in the group always agree with each other.
meanings.sent2: Online quizzes can help identify your likers and dislikers.
meanings.sent3: The likers of sunny weather are always in a good mood.
meanings.sent4: He had a reputation as the liker of all jokes, no matter how corny.
meanings.sent5: The likers of nature find peace in the great outdoors.
